title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the Control Example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively, causing visual distraction.
OB: Open the Control Example and resize the window in the vertical direction only.
EB: Notice that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
SR: Reduce the flashing effect in the Control Example when resizing the window in the vertical direction.
